clean_text:
Preparation of complexes

A mixture of Ln2O3 (0.5 mmol; Sm2O3, 174 mg; Eu2O3, 176 mg), 36% HCl 0.3 ml (0.36 mmol), 1.5 mmol of 1,3-BDC acid (250 mg), 0.5 ml 3,5-lutidine and 10 ml H2O was put into a 23 ml Teflon coated stainless steel autoclave and heated at 180 °C for 4 days. After cooled to room temperature naturally, a large amount of needle-liked crystals were obtained. The crystals were separated by vacuum filtration and washed with distill water and absolute alcohol.

[Sm2(BDC)3(H2O)2] n  (1). Yield: 286 mg (69%). Found: C, 34.59; H, 1.65. C24H16O14Sm2 requires: C, 34.77; H, 1.95. IR (cm-1): 3439s, 3080m, 1613vs, 1546vs, 1479s, 1453vs, 1389vs, 1188m, 1161m, 1077m, 826w, 745s, 713s, 701m, 655w, 581m, 540m, 423m.
